name: Deo
storyline: This is the adventure of the little angel Deo, who has the mission to find the evil demon Lukas, who has stolen his magical crown. To succeed he must pass through five locked gates located across five worlds. The last gate leads to the Lukas' Den, where Deo has to come face to face with Lukas to get his crown back.
summary: Deo is a 3D adventure-platform game with unique input model. The rich set of actions and game mechanics make Deo a truly challenging game for even the most experienced gamers. The game features large realms with lots of secret and hidden areas, various creatures and challenging obstacles.
